overview: The main character is the titular scientist, gifted with a gentle sense of humor, a wise distance to life and a considerable storytelling talent. The action of the following episodes usually begins in the scenery of a quiet, cozy cafe, where Professor Tutek meets with three friends: a patron, judge and doctor. The gentlemen spend their time telling various stories, in which, of course, the scientist leads the way.
title: Klub profesora Tutki
